title: How to Improve the Background of Your Photograph

steps.headline: Get rid of it.
steps.description: Cut out the bad parts of the background and just have the subject of your shot with fewer distractions. Use your 'Crop' tool on your graphic software.

steps.headline: Using masks or selection tools, separate your your subject from the background and blur the background.
steps.description: That will make it much easier to focus on the subject.

steps.headline: Try making the background of the photo completely black and white and your subject the only part of the photograph with color.
Try removing the background completely.
steps.description: Totally separate it from the rest of the image and replace it with the background of your choice.

text: Get rid of it. Cut out the bad parts of the background and just have the subject of your shot with fewer distractions. Use your 'Crop' tool on your graphic software. Using masks or selection tools, separate your your subject from the background and blur the background. That will make it much easier to focus on the subject. Try making the background of the photo completely black and white and your subject the only part of the photograph with color.  Try removing the background completely. Totally separate it from the rest of the image and replace it with the background of your choice.
